description: You all love the longsleeve version of their pearl snappin’ Crosscut Deluxe. They decided to lop off the sleeves and make the Crosscut Deluxe Shortsleeve so you can saw through the hottest summer days with ease. They kept all the top level Howler embroidery and, of course, a bounty of pearl snaps.
name: Howler Bros Crosscut Deluxe SS Shirt - Mens
